title: Excellent
text: We were in Santorini during off peak season and were so lucky to find this place. We were unaware that reservations were needed and were so grateful to the the staff for working us in. The food here was some of the best we had in Greece and the atmosphere had a cool and relaxed vibe. I would recommend eating here twice! The feta balls are not to be missed.

title: Great little hotel
text: Stayed for 3 nights. Rooms were sufficient, who is really in Santorini to stay inside? The views are beautiful and breakfast was plentiful. We stayed during off peak season so it was a bit of a walk to find open restaurants. Even so I would stay here again.

title: AMAZING
text: The Agora is absolutely a must with the temple being the highlight. It is astonishing to see such a complete structure from thousands of years ago. We went the weather was cool and spent about 2 hours walking the grounds. It was an excellent afternoon.

title: If you have time
text: If you have extra time the stadium is worth the visit but I would not go out of my way to see it. The audio guide is worth listening to as you walk the path around the site. Climb to the top for some of the best views of the Acropolis.

title: Excellent Museum
text: Great place to spend a few hours. I spoke with a few curators. All of which were happy to answer my questions about the exhibits.

title: Does this need a review?
text: It is pretty obvious that most people visit Athens to see this sight so there is not much more I can add. I will say that the climb up is much easier than anticipated and well worth the effort.

title: Must see
text: A must see after you visit the Acropolis! The collection of statues with visible paint really transforms the image of ancient Athens. You must also walk through the excavations under the museum. Well worth the small entrance fee.

title: Excellent
text: We cannot say enough about iur tour. We did the extended Argolis tour. Our driver George was fantastic. He keep the tour on schedule and was full of information. Everything went as planned. It was one of the highlights of our trip to Greece.

title: Average Hotel
text: I have stayed here twice now. Average hotel with a very good breakfast. Beds a bit hard. Location is good. Quick walk to restaurants. Easy transfer to airport, about 20 minutes. Friendly reception staff.

title: Great overnight stay
text: Great stay before cruise. Very clean and comfortable rooms. About 20 minutes to port and airport. Very good Mexican restaurant across the street, several other restaurants near by. In a business area so pretty quite on the weekend. I would recommend.
place: Courtyard by Marriott Fort Lauderdale Weston

title: Great market
text: Great local market with a wide variety of products. I bought very good produce but the market also had a lot of spices, meats, cheeses and fish
